name: WikiLMS – WordPress LMS Plugin for eLearning
author: Devthrow

sections.description:
WikiLMS is a simple and versatile Learning Management System (LMS) plugin created to transform your WordPress website into an engaging and interactive online learning platform. Whether you’re an educator, a trainer, or a business owner looking to offer courses and training materials, WikiLMS provides the essential tools and features you need to create, manage, and deliver effective eLearning experiences.

Features

Explore WikiLMS plugin’s standout features. For additional details or inquiries, reach out to us. Discover the prime offerings of WikiLMS below.

  • Page builder support
  • Unlimited Courses
  • Simple and Easy to use
  • Contact form adding option by shortcode
  • Price, Duration, Skill Level, Max Students, Course Access, Language ect course info adding option
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugin > Add new’.
2. Search for ‘WikiLMS’.
3. Activate WikiLMS from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org
1. Search, select and download WikiLMS.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard.
sections.faq:
What is WikiLMS?

Transform your WordPress website into an interactive online learning hub with WikiLMS, an intuitive Learning Management System (LMS) plugin.

Is this plugin free?

This plugin is completely free! But to make it work, you need to install the WikiLMS plugin. Even the templates included in this plugin are free as well.

Can I use WikiLMS with any WordPress site?

Yes, WikiLMS seamlessly integrates with any WordPress site, making it easy to use with your existing website.

Can I use WikiLMS with Elementor?

Yes, with WikiLMS, you can integrate with Elementor page builder.

How do I get a form shortcode?

You can use the Contact Form 7 shortcode for this
